title.line1: Find your dream home with the help of

hero.subtitle: without agents, without huge commissions, without headaches
hero.description: Your AI real estate assistant helps you instantly discover, select and schedule viewings - at a fraction of the cost of a traditional agency.

personalAssistant.title: Your personal AI assistant
personalAssistant.description: Available 24/7, remembers your preferences, speaks your language (RO/EN).

personalizedSearch.title: Fast and personalized search
personalizedSearch.description: Instant suggestions based on your needs - no endless searching.

correctPrice.title: Fair and transparent pricing
correctPrice.description: You pay less than 0.5% of what you would pay a real estate agency.

betterExperience.title: A better experience
betterExperience.description: From search to offer, you get an intuitive and simple process - without agents.

description.paragraph1: At DOORS, we believe that buying or selling a home should be fair, transparent and stress-free. Our AI assistant makes the real estate process simpler, more accessible and friendlier than traditional methods.
description.paragraph2: We are determined to bring this solution to every buyer and seller in Romania, combining cutting-edge artificial intelligence with the trust and clarity that the real estate industry so desperately needs.

features.protectedData: Your data is protected according to GDPR.
features.localFocus: Local focus: real estate from Romania, in your language
features.verifiedListings: Verified listings and secure payments for a risk-free experience.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Simple, fair, token-based
features: You start for free with an included token package
Each interaction with AI consumes a few tokens
You recharge only when you need it

tokens.question: What are tokens and how do they work?
tokens.answer: Tokens are virtual credits for AI interactions. You get them free at the start and can buy more anytime.

dataSafety.question: Is my data safe?
dataSafety.answer: Yes, all data is protected according to standards and is only shared with mentioned third parties.

buyerSeller.question: Can I use the platform as both a seller and a buyer?
buyerSeller.answer: Yes, the platform is designed for both roles and offers complete functionality for selling and buying properties.

whyDoors.question: Why choose DOORS and not a classic agency?
whyDoors.answer: DOORS offers complete transparency, reduced costs and immediate access to information, eliminating intermediaries and large commissions.

finalCta.title: Your dream home is just one conversation away
finalCta.subtitle: Try the AI assistant now:

footer.slogan: Find the perfect home quickly, safely and intelligently.

register-page.title: Sign Up
register-page.subtitle: Create your account to get started

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information.

terms-of-service.title: Terms of Service
terms-of-service.introduction: These Terms of Service govern your use of our platform and services.
